descreption: I'm a full-stack developer specializing in building fast and responsive React/Next js website with Flask API.
movie_description: A website to display all the popular, upcoming and the most rated movies, with the possibility of logging in to save the movies in the watch list.
path_description: A website search for shortest path between two nodes using two algorithms (A*, Dijkstra) with tools for drawing walls and control the animation.
username_description: A website allows the user to search for a username in social media platforms in one place and checks if the username is available or not.
